resources.string: Do you really want to exit this game?
Find a path from the beginning (upper left corner) to the end (lower right corner) in as less time as possible.
Diagonal fields are not permitted. On your way you must tap on every number, but just once!
Touch a field to select it. A second touch deselects the last field. A new field can be appended only at the end of the snake.
You will be logged in automatically and can get high scores or achievements.
You won\'t be logged in automatically and can\'t get high scores or achievements.
Without a network connection no high score or achievement can be submitted.\nPress refresh button for a new try.
To get achievements and high scores you have to sign in.\nYou can change your selection at any time in the settings.

string-array.item: Goal:Complete the snake and be fast. You have to find a path from the beginning to the end in as less time as possible.

Rules:It is your task to complete the snake\'s path from the upper left corner to the lower right corner. On your way you\'ll cross many numbers, but you can pass one number just once. And every number has to be on your path. The order you choose to cross the numbers does not matter.
Source Code:If you are interested in the source code of this application you may find it at <github.com>:\nVisit <https://github.com/brunothg/SnakingNumbers> for version controlled source code.
